title: Mother’s Day at Vision Care
body_lines: Vision Care, Sri Lanka’s largest vision and eye wear solutions provider, is celebrating Mother’s Day by reminding customers that one of the best ways to love and honour the special motherly figure in their lives is helping them take care of their eyesight by undergoing an eye test at any Vision Care branch from 8 May onwards. Customers can visit any Vision Care outlet countrywide with that special person to get her eyes tested by their eyecare professionals using state-of-the-art equipment after which she can choose from the extensive selection of products that includes spectacles, sunglasses, and contact lenses.
